tool_description:
Real-time calculation of winning odds/percentages and possible scenarios against opponents at all stages of the gameplay.
You can also use it to develop and implement winning poker strategies.
name: Poker Odds Calculator
title: Poker Odds Calculator

api_list.name: /pre-flop
api_list.description: Get the pre-flop hole cards strength and the odds of hitting something on the flop  (As = Ace of Spades, Tc = Ten of Clubs, 4d = Four of Diamonds, ...).

required_parameters.name: hole
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 2 hole cards.

api_list.name: /river
api_list.description: Odds at the river, winning & opponent probabilities  (As = Ace of Spades, Tc = Ten of Clubs, 4d = Four of Diamonds, ...).

required_parameters.name: board
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 5 community cards.

required_parameters.name: hole
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 2 hole cards.

api_list.name: /turn
api_list.description: Odds at the turn, winning & opponent probabilities and analysis of possible scenarios with next comming card (the river)  (As = Ace of Spades, Tc = Ten of Clubs, 4d = Four of Diamonds, ...).

required_parameters.name: board
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 4 community cards.

required_parameters.name: hole
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 2 hole cards.

api_list.name: /describe
api_list.description: Return the description of the poker hand formed by the 5 supplied cards  (As = Ace of Spades, Tc = Ten of Clubs, 4d = Four of Diamonds, ...).

required_parameters.name: hand
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 5 hand cards.

api_list.name: /flop
api_list.description: Return odds at the flop, winning & opponent probabilities and analysis of possible scenarios with next comming card (the turn)  (As = Ace of Spades, Tc = Ten of Clubs, 4d = Four of Diamonds, ...).

required_parameters.name: board
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 3 community cards.

required_parameters.name: hole
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of 2 hole cards.

api_list.name: /range-compare
api_list.description: Return  range against range statistical analysis at the flop.

required_parameters.name: opponent
required_parameters.description:
List of the cards in the player opening range (AA = pocket aces, T9s = Ten and Nine suited, 42o = Four and Two off suit, ...).
You can use the ':' symbol to describe a block of cards (AA:QJs), the '-' to match a diagonal '77-33', and the '+' to match a card and every upper hole cards (JTs+).  The response payload gives you the cards matched against your pattern .

required_parameters.name: me
required_parameters.description:
List of the cards in the player opening range (AA = pocket aces, T9s = Ten and Nine suited, 42o = Four and Two off suit, ...).
You can use the ':' symbol to describe a block of cards (AA:QJs), the '-' to match a diagonal '77-33', and the '+' to match a card and every upper hole cards (JTs+).  The response payload gives you the cards matched against your pattern .
